I recently had the pleasure of working with Tx Pool & Construction for pool updates at Spring Valley Apartments, and I couldn't be happier with the results! From start to finish, their team was professional, efficient, and attentive to … More Response from the owner 3 weeks ago We appreciate your kind words. We treat our customers’ projects as our own, and we’re glad to hear that reflects in your satisfaction.

We enjoyed working with TX Pool & Construction!  Armando, Uriel and Stephanie were very attentive to our needs and treated us like family.  The quality of their craftsmanship was excellent and while they weren't the cheapest quote we received, we don't regret using them at all.  In fact, we highly recommend them! More Response from the owner 2 years ago Channda, thank you so much for the kind words!

We are OBSESSED with the outcome of our backyard! Never in a million years did I think our tiny backyard space was capable of this beautiful oasis. Thank you Armando & Uriel for your great communication and dedication to completing our project. This is easily everyone’s favorite area of our home. ☀️🍉🕶 … More Response from the owner 2 years ago
Thanks Isabel! We’re happy that you’re pleased with the outcome.
